data.name: Silentium
data.detailed_description:
Sentenced to death in the labyrinth for crimes you were not guilty of. As a survivor you will face terrifying monsters, ancient golems, corrupt slimes, and much much more. Discover allies or foes who have shared the same fate. Are those who give their aid all just or do they have a darker past?
Unlock a primordial forge where weapons and armor could be useful on your quest. Grow your own crops in town at the farm, craft potions and cook food for supplies. Survive the labyrinth long enough to uncover the primordial magics of these forsaken halls and find what horrors the ancient races intended to be buried – forever.
data.about_the_game:
Sentenced to death in the labyrinth for crimes you were not guilty of. As a survivor you will face terrifying monsters, ancient golems, corrupt slimes, and much much more. Discover allies or foes who have shared the same fate. Are those who give their aid all just or do they have a darker past?
Unlock a primordial forge where weapons and armor could be useful on your quest. Grow your own crops in town at the farm, craft potions and cook food for supplies. Survive the labyrinth long enough to uncover the primordial magics of these forsaken halls and find what horrors the ancient races intended to be buried – forever.
data.short_description: Delve into the labyrinth and decide your fate! A 2D turn-based RPG with dungeon building aspects. Farm, grow weapons, create new class combinations, and make hard decisions that will have consequences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5850
